entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who needs help after he's gone. He is described as being able to get his own food but needing company.

entities.name: gawp
entities.description: Grawp is Hagrid's brother and is described as looking strangely misshapen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having already promised Hagrid that he would do whatever he asked.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as exchanging miserable looks with Harry and inquiring about what Hagrid needs help with.

entities.name: gawp's head
entities.description: Grawp's head is described as being much larger in proportion to the body than a human head.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Grawp are brothers, as mentioned in the text.
Harry has already promised Hagrid that he would do whatever he asked.
Hermione inquires about what Hagrid needs help with.
Grawp needs company, as mentioned by Hagrid.
